channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Treasury yields slip after ISM’s services reading drops for November
item.description: U.S. government debt rallied on Wednesday, sending yields lower, after the Institute for Supply Management’s survey of service companies for November ...

item.title: Trump Picks Paul Atkins to Run SEC
item.description: The former SEC commissioner is expected to ease oversight, including on cryptocurrency firms.

item.title: Dollar Falls After Services PMI Data
item.description: The dollar weakened after the ISM services PMI November print declined more than economists expected.

item.title: Spindrift Sparkling Water Nears Sale to Private-Equity Firm
item.description: The deal is expected to value the drink maker at over $650 million.

item.title: Gold Edges Higher After U.S. Job Creation Slowed
item.description: Gold prices rose after U.S. jobs data showed private payrolls growth was less than expected in November.

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Fall More Than Expected
item.description: U.S. crude oil inventories fell more than expected last week and product stocks saw a buildup as refineries ramped up their capacity use.

item.title: UnitedHealth executive Brian Thompson shot and killed in ‘targeted attack’ — here’s what we know
item.description: Authorities say the veteran health-insurance executive was shot Wednesday morning by an unknown assailant outside the company’s investor conference.

item.title: Terns’s stock soars as analysts cheer leukemia data — and predict more gains
item.description: The pharma company now has two positive proof-of-concept trials under its belt, including its weight-loss pill.

item.title: Holding cash heading into 2025? Retirees should consider this ‘guaranteed’ investment strategy in the new year.
item.description: Now could be a good time to invest in TIPS.

item.title: Inflation threatens Fed rate-cut expectations once again. Here’s why.
item.description: With investors looking toward Friday’s November nonfarm-payrolls report, market participants see the potential that it could be overshadowed by an ent...
